entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
